plot outline: In a remote scenic village people are living their daily lives until one day a dead body is seen floating in the river.Naami is a hard working beautiful women in with two kids and a fit for nothing husband ,she has many admires due to her beauty.As the body was found next to her house near in the river cops frequently come for inquiry one of them being Inspector Dinesh Asole who now lusts for her. One day on pretext of inquiry he takes her to police station in the night and rapes her.A local reporter Uttam comes to know this and wants justice for Naami and reports it to his editor Shinde.But Shinde wants to make business through this news and local cops want to cover up the story.
title: Sat Na Gat
plot: In a remote scenic village people are living their daily lives until one day a dead body is seen floating in the river.Naami is a hard working beautiful women in with two kids and a fit for nothing husband ,she has many admires due to her beauty.As the body was found next to her house near in the river cops frequently come for inquiry one of them being Inspector Dinesh Asole who now lusts for her. One day on pretext of inquiry he takes her to police station in the night and rapes her.A local reporter Uttam comes to know this and wants justice for Naami and reports it to his editor Shinde.But Shinde wants to make business through this news and local cops want to cover up the story.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com

Naami a beautiful village women is lusted by villagers once a dead body appears on village banks an she is questioned for it as her house is close to the river.Inspector Asole investigating the case calls her to the police station an rapes her on pretext of investigation Uttam Vable a reporter finds about the incident and wants justice to Naami he reports to his editor Shinde.But Shinde has no sympathy towards Naami and wants to sell his paper with the story the incident sparks like a fire in village and people look weirdly towards Naami as the politics and media plays its part Naami suffers as her kids are dying out of hunger .It is only Uttam who wants to give her justice.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
